name: Jumpy Jeff
description:
Are you ready for the challenge of a lifetime?

Tap to make 'Jumpy Jeff' jump. Avoid the walls to level up and grab those trophies to bling Jumpy up!

- Pro Pimp Poncho
- Hip Hop Helmet
- Cherry On Top Mint Ice Cream
- Sickest Pro Skateboarder Trucks
- Pro Snorkel Goggles

...and more!

The amazing new Jumpy Jeff is here.

Play on an iPod, iPhone or iPad.

Enjoy!
